{{application}}: The "recent cpu usage" for the JVM process

host: The "recent cpu usage" for the whole system

panels.description:
daemon: The current number of live daemon threads

non-daemon: The current number of live non-daemon threads

max: The peak live thread count since the JVM started or peak was reset

panels.description: The total(heap + non-heap) amount of used memory

panels.title: Pause duration

panels.description:
allocated: Incremented for an increase in the size of the young generation memory pool after one GC to before the next

promoted: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
panels.title: Allocated / Promoted rate

panels.description: per-second average rate of increase of log events (Unit:  counts/sec)
panels.title: Log rate
